channel.title: Need help with Solitude Source [PI] Adding ranks
channel.description:
Hello.
I had a source from a server... vistex... it has over 10 custom ranks and i want them on solitude source... how could i make customs ranks please ? anyone can help me ? I will rep ++ if you help me.
I did add the modicons in the cache/sprite/player/... where the modicons should go.
what next should i do. i know i have to put some stuff in the client and in the server side.
Please. Help me .
